title: "How Does Google’s BERT Algorithm Update Affect Your Website’s SEO?"
excerpt: "BERT stands for Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers. It is a natural language processing algorithm that allows a machine to understand what words mean in context. BERT works by encoding sentences in both directions simultaneously rather than reading the words from left to right. Then, it encodes each word in the sentence ..."
